yes_no.name: field_type_toggle
yes_no.name_friendly: Field Type (text: 150 character limit; textarea: unlimited)

dataset.name: footer_links
dataset.name_friendly: Footer Links e.g. Terms of Use

text.name: timeline_title
text.name_friendly: Timeline Title (leave blank if you do not want a timeline on your site)

textarea.name: hours_title
textarea.name_friendly: Hours Title, e.g. Hours of Operation

dataset.name: hours_of_operation
dataset.name_friendly: Hours of Operation (leave blank if closed)

dropdown.name: default_fields
dropdown.options: no_form:No Form;patient_basic:Patient Basic;patient_address:Patient Address;patient_address_and_pet_info:Patient address and Pet Info;

one_to_many.name: additional_fields
one_to_many.name_friendly: Additional Form Fields (add additional fields that you've created in the Custom Form dataset)

dropdown.name: number_of_cols
dropdown.name_friendly: Number of Photos in a Row (if 3 is selected, there will be 3 photos per row)
